articles.author: Luke Pentony
articles.title: Serena Williams marches on at Australian Open, Bianca Andreescu out in upset loss - ABC News
articles.description: Petra Kvitová and Bianca Andreescu make early exits at Melbourne Park, while Serena Williams drops just three games on her way to booking a place in the third round.
articles.content:
Top 10 stars Petra Kvitová and Bianca Andreescu have made early exits from the Australian Open, while seven-time champion Serena Williams safely moved through to the third round.

articles.description: The Rubik's Cube of the women's draw proved too tough to solve for the Canadian, winning in straight sets.
